name: ToyTopia (itch)
description:
ToyTopia

You are trapped within the Toystore and you need to find a way out by completing objectives, figuring out puzzles and running away from Life-sized Toys

Controls - Can be changed in-game

WASDMove PlayerSpacebarJump
ShiftSprintLCtrlCrouchEInteractFToggle FlashlightGSwap ItemsHHeal PlayerLMBPush/PullEscPause Menu
